## Problem 1

First, create a data frame. 

```{r}
set.seed(1)

df = tibble(
  rand_samp = rnorm(10),
  logical_vec = rand_samp > 0,
  char_vec = vector("character", 10),
  factor_vec = factor(x = character(10),3)
)
```
